name: antigravity-multi-agent-orchestrator
description: Multi-Agent Orchestrator for Google Antigravity with specialized PM, Frontend, Backend, Mobile, and QA agents

scripts.setup:antigravity: echo 'Please ensure Google Antigravity is installed: https://antigravity.google/download'
scripts.validate:skills: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const skills = ['orchestrator', 'pm-agent', 'frontend-agent', 'backend-agent', 'mobile-agent', 'qa-agent']; skills.forEach(s => { const path = `.agent/skills/${s}/SKILL.md`; if (!fs.existsSync(path)) { console.error(`Missing: ${path}`); process.exit(1); } }); console.log('âœ… All skills validated');"
